<p>Got 30 minutes? ProCraftia has posted up a real treat of a KSP short film named Antarctica. It’s worth the time. Sit down. Relax. Enjoy.</p>
first comment srr for spam and wow AMAzing gotta say loved it.
Thats a great short movie! And the plot is also really nice. Good work!

I was able to watch it because of a proxy. Sorry, but I've got no idea how to setup a proxy, cause my father done that. I hope you can watch the movie soon!

You can use a proxy(idcloak.com) or VPN. Both are free of charge.

I use the TOR browser bundle to watch the blocked stuff. You can also simply use proxyfree.com (no installation required)
After watching this I think I feel sorry for Bob. Is he like the KSP version of Family Guy's Meg?

After watching this I think I feel sorry for Bob. Is he like the KSP version of Family Guy's Meg?

Ha ha, I suppose he his. The real reason he's not in my cinematics is because in my main save he's renamed to HatBat. So when writing it never crosses my mind that he actually exists. Plus I just find Bob's character to be a bit distasteful, in my opinion of KSP lore he's just 'the stupid guy' and that doesn't really work well for dramatic emotionally pushed movies.

Ha ha, I suppose he his. The real reason he's not in my cinematics is because in my main save he's renamed to HatBat. So when writing it never crosses my mind that he actually exists. Fair enough, but ummmm.... I think you have Bill and Bob backward. Bill is the stupid one. Bob is the least stupid of the three.

Fair enough, but ummmm.... I think you have Bill and Bob backward. Bill is the stupid one. Bob is the least stupid of the three.

I've always seen it the other way around. The name Bill sounds quite up-tight to me and Bob sounds a bit empty headed. That's probably just because in media they always name stick figures and simpleton characters Bob

I've always seen it the other way around. The name Bill sounds quite up-tight to me and Bob sounds a bit empty headed. That's probably just because in media they always name stick figures and simpleton characters Bob
